user-prompt-submit-hook.description: Auto-log all tool executions to active log file
user-prompt-submit-hook.command: bash -c '[ -f debugging/current_log_file.txt ] && LOG_FILE=$(cat debugging/current_log_file.txt) && [ -n "$LOG_FILE" ] && echo "[$(date +%H:%M:%S)] User message received" >> "$LOG_FILE" || true'

tool-call-hook.command:
bash -c '[ -f debugging/current_log_file.txt ] && LOG_FILE=$(cat debugging/current_log_file.txt) && [ -n "$LOG_FILE" ] && echo -e "
---
[$(date +%H:%M:%S)] TOOL: $TOOL_NAME
PARAMS: $TOOL_PARAMS" >> "$LOG_FILE" || true'

tool-result-hook.command:
bash -c '[ -f debugging/current_log_file.txt ] && LOG_FILE=$(cat debugging/current_log_file.txt) && [ -n "$LOG_FILE" ] && echo -e "[$(date +%H:%M:%S)] RESULT: $([ "$TOOL_EXIT_CODE" = "0" ] && echo "✅ Success" || echo "❌ Failed (exit $TOOL_EXIT_CODE)")
OUTPUT:
$TOOL_OUTPUT
---" >> "$LOG_FILE" || true'
